backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing complaint submission, storage, role‑based access, and priority/scoring logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping authentication‑UI and landing‑page updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Index of short summaries for all major frontend files including routing, authentication UI, complaint pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions using custom OKLCH civic color palette.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main entry script.
frontend/README.md: Setup guide explaining prerequisites and steps to run the Civic Lens frontend project.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, routes, auth/state hooks, layout wrapper, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth control showing logout when signed in or Google/Apple sign‑in options when logged out.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Placeholder modal for initial user profile setup after authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInOptio: Google/Apple sign‑in buttons wired to Internet Identity login logic with loading and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Befor: Component displaying before/after complaint photos with status‑based badges and pending fallback.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Compl: Displays key complaint metadata including priority, SLA, timestamps, location, and reporter using various badges and formatted dates.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Escal: Shows a destructive badge indicating when a complaint was escalated, formatted as time ago.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Photo: Handles image upload with validation, preview display, and removal, notifying parent via callback.
frontend/src/components/complaints/Prior: Renders a priority badge with icon and label based on urgency level.
frontend/src/components/complaints/SlaBa: Displays SLA status, showing overdue or remaining time based on due date and complaint status.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Resolut: Form for submitting resolution feedback including confirmation, rating, comments, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Application layout with navigation, auth-aware links, responsive menu, and header/footer structure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, authentication management, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating complaint data through an actor, including submission, status updates, and role checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode styling, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/MyReportsPage: Displays a citizen’s submitted complaints with status, priority, and navigation to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/citizen/SubmitComplai: Form page allowing authenticated users to submit a new complaint with category, description, location, and photo.
frontend/src/pages/complaints/ComplaintD: Displays a detailed view of a single complaint with status updates, before/after photos, and admin-only resolution actions.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Documentation page showing project prerequisites and setup steps using styled cards and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, sign-in options, and explanation of how the civic reporting process works.
frontend/src/pages/official/HigherOffici: Shows escalated complaints to higher officials with priority and escalation indicators, gated by admin access.
frontend/src/pages/official/OfficialDash: Provides officials with tabbed lists of open and in‑progress complaints, each showing priority and deadline info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL or session‑persisted parameters including hash‑based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, architecture notes, requirements, and versioned state.
